Comment: > Gotten the rest of Nato Countries to spend more money on there military  Trump wasn't responsible for that. NATO countries agreed to raise their spending at a meeting in 2014 while Obama was president, and obviously the 2022 invasion of Ukraine by Russia motivated a lot of countries to step up their game.  > so hopefully we will be able to pull back on our own spending theoretically.  That doesn't make any sense. Are you under the impression that we only spend a ton on our military because other countries don't spend enough and we feel some obligation to protect them? Because that isn't the case. Our high military spending is for our own benefit and nobody else's. It's going to continue to be high regardless of what our allies spend on their militaries.
